Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that’s a copy of it except it has haste and “This creature attacks each combat if able.” Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Bloodborn 3–{1}{R} [i]({1}{R}: Exile this from your graveyard with three gore counters. It gains “{X}: Remove X gore counters from this. Activate as a sorcery.” Cast a copy of it for free when you remove the last.)[/i]
